content.question: Settlement house work as described by Muncy had the most in common with womenâ€™s activism during which of the following earlier periods?

choices.label: The Protestant evangelism of the mid-1700s
The decade leading up to the American Revolution
The two decades following the American Revolution
The Second Great Awakening in the first half of the 1800s

content.answer: The Second Great Awakening in the first half of the 1800s

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
